verses.roman:
haridāse loke pūje, sahite nā pāre
tāṅra apamāna karite nānā upāya kare

synonyms: haridāse—unto Haridāsa Ṭhākura; loke—people; pūje—offer respect; sahite nā pāre—he could not tolerate; tāṅra—his; apamāna—dishonor; karite—to do; nānā—various; upāya—means; kare—plans.
translation: Unable to tolerate that such respect was being offered to Haridāsa Ṭhākura, Rāmacandra Khān planned in various ways to dishonor him.
